GSD.description:
video: fbdev: i740fb: Check the argument of i740_calc_vclk()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.63 by commit e740e787f06671455b59d1e498c9945f7b4e7b3b. For more details please see the references link.
